EmailTemplate.subject: A little more on Pivotal CF
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you again for visiting us at VMworld this year. I wanted to send you a little more information about Pivotal CF.
Pivotal CF is the Enterprise version of Cloud Foundry and is a PaaS solution proven to be highly compatible with VMWare products <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/pivotal-vmware-cloud> such as vSphere and vCloud Air. It is an open solution that can run on both public and/or private infrastructure technologies from other vendors, giving you high levels of flexibility.
At our booth you saw our capabilities, namely:
- Seamless DevOps integration - Automated environment provisioning - Fast application load balancing - Failover and monitoring - Integration with common monitoring and log aggregation technologies such as Splunk, New Relic and App Dynamics
Please take advantage of our 60 day free trial <http://run.pivotal.io/> with Pivotal Web Services.
Please check out our Pivotal CF datasheet <http://www.pivotal.io/sites/default/files/Pivotal%20CF_for%20Pivotal.pdf> for a summary of Pivotal CF and its features. There are also a number of videos that talk through the features, including:
- Pivotal CF 1.0 Demo <http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PfXamjLhJDI> - Pivotal CF â€“ The Future is now <http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a7kYxpSMIME> - Demo of Pivotal CF and vCAC <http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KuYc_DZYOdU>
Would you be available on Wednesday for a call?
Kind regards,
Sarah Clayton Pivotal EMEA NEMEA ISR Account Manager +44 7585 995 090 <tel:+44 7585 995 090> sclayton@pivotal.io <mailto:sclayton@pivotal.io?subject=Responding to: A little more on Pivotal CF> http://pivotal.io/ <http://pivotal.io/>
